forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 62F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 53F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
